name: SHALL 8-Piece Adjustable Wrench & Water Pump Pliers Set, 12/10/8/6 Inch, 4Pcs Adjustable Tongue and Groove Joint Pliers and 4Pcs Wide Jaw Forged Steel Wrench for Plumbing, Gripping, Auto Home Repair
short_description: Set Include : Comes with 4 piece of water pump pliers (6’’/ 8’’ 10’’ 12’’) and 4 piece of adjustable wrenches (6’’/ 8’’ 10’’ 12’’), which will make your work easier, safer, and more efficient

Multi-Grip: The V-jaw allows groove joint pliers to grip any pipes, nuts or bolts in shapes of square, flat, circle, hex etc; The precise grooves on jaws make it grip and hold more secure, effectively preventing accidental sliding and improving work efficiency

Bi-Material Handle: The comfortable bi-material handle of tongue and groove pliers are ergonomically designed for easy grip and hold; The size and shape of the handle fits perfectly in the palm, which can effectively reduce hand fatigue

Flexible Worm Gear: With its’ precise knurled design, the worm gear of the plumbers wrench smoothly adjusts the jaw without jamming or hand injury; More precise slots with smaller gap ensure it stays on the exact scale after adjustment
Laser-Etched Scale: Each wrench is laser-etched with a precise SAE scale, with high-grade mirror polishing treatment, it allows users to read the scale size more clearly and conveniently

Adjustable Jaw Design: With their respective groove design and worm gear, the adjustable groove joint pliers and wide jaw wrench can be freely adjusted to different opening sizes; The max openings of 4 pliers are 1’’, 1-1/2’’, 2’’, 2-1/4’’; The max openings of 4 wrenches are 13/16”, 1-1/16”, 1-3/16”, 1-7/16’’
Robust Build Quality: Constructed of durable drop-forged steel, adjustable wrench and groove joint pliers show excellent performance in durability and toughness
Widely Used : Ideal for basic home use such as automotive maintenance and repair, plumbing and general assembly tasks

name: GEARWRENCH 16 Piece Ratcheting Combination Wrench Set with Tray | Metric | 9416
short_description: The Gearwrench 72 tooth ratcheting box end needs a minimal 5° to move fasteners vs 30° for standard wrenches
Off corner loading design on box end provides better grip and reduces fastener rounding
The Gearwrench Combination Wrench Set has pass thru technology works down any length of threaded rod and long bolts
Thin head and beam provide greater access in confined work areas
Plastic Wrench Rack included for tool retention and storage
product_description: GEARWRENCH original Ratcheting wrenches combine the speed of a ratchet with the access and control of a wrench. They offer the ease of 5 degrees of movement to turn fasteners, versus 30 degrees on standard combination wrenches. The small Ratcheting box end Head design enables access to tight spots where a ratchet won't fit. The open end allows for easier access on tough to reach spots, making jobs go faster and easier. This set is a great addition to any mechanic tools Collection.

short_description: CORROSION RESISTANCE: The adjustable wrench set has full polish chrome finish
QUICK SIZE IDENTIFICATION: Adjustable wrench comes with large markings
ADDED VERSATILITY: The wrench comes with wide opening jaws
Meets or Exceeds ASME Specifications
product_description: 3-piece All Steel Wrench Set offers a number of applications of a CRAFTSMAN tool from the standard bolt turning to working on specific automotive repairs.

product_description: The CRAFTSMAN® 7-piece Standard (SAE) Combination Wrench Set in Pouch features the iconic raised panel combination wrench design. This set delivers the quality and durability expected from the Craftsman name. This set includes the following sizes: 1/4-in, 5/16-in, 11/32-in, 3/8-in, 7/16-in, 1/2-in and 9/16-in.

name: Topline 4-piece Adjustable Wrench Set with Wide Handle, Included 12-In, 10-In, 8-In, 6-In, Adjustable Wrench Set with Measurement Scales, Perfect for Plumbing, Home and Garage Applications
short_description: A common adjustable wrench set included 12-inch, 10-inch, 8-inch and 6-inch. It is suitable for a variety of household use and work requirements.
Drop forged steel with heat treated for durability and last strength. Wide Forged Steel Handle features a rounded i-beam design for comfort and control.
Measurement Scales are laser engraved and handy for sizing nuts, pipe and tube diameters.
Knurled Adjusting Mechanism for quick and precise adjustment. Adjustable Jaw Design allows tool to grip many fastener sizes.
Multiple sizes available for daily household use and automotive, industrial maintenance.

name: Set of 3 Adjustable Wrench Set | Crescent Wrenches, Spanner Wrench Tool Set for Plumbing, Large & Small Adjustable Pliers, Thin and Self-Locking Wrenches – Ideal Hand Tools for Plumbers & DIY
short_description: Versatile Adjustable Wrench Set: This 3-piece wrench set includes small, medium, and large adjustable wrenches, perfect for various tasks – from plumbing repairs to tightening bolts. Ideal for home improvement, DIY projects, and professional use

Premium Quality & Durability: Made with high-grade steel, these tools ensure long-lasting durability. Whether you're using them as plumber's wrenches, spud wrenches, or crescent tools, they can withstand heavy-duty jobs

Universal Fit with Precision: Designed to function as crescent wrenches, spanner wrenches, or pipe wrenches, this set covers a wide range of jobs. Works great on angle stops, shower heads, and other plumbing fittings

Great Value Wrench Tool Set: Whether for clearance hand tools sales or gifting, this adjustable spanner wrench set is the perfect solution. Compact yet versatile, it includes large and small wrenches for all your needs – from Klein-style adjustable tools to mountain wrenches

Essential Hand Tools for Every Toolbox: A must-have wrench tool set for professionals and DIYers. This plumber’s and crescent wrench set works great as a pipe wrench set or monkey wrench alternative. Perfect for home repairs and automotive projects.

name: Crescent 15 Piece 12 Point Metric Combination Wrench Set with Tool Roll - CCWS5-05
short_description: Incredible strength and corrosion resistance from specially formulated and heat-treated chrome alloy steel
Off-corner loading design on box end provides better grip and reduces fastener rounding
Sizes stamped on both sides of each wrench for easy identification
Bright, full polish chrome finish easily wipes clean and resists corrosion
Includes tool roll for storage and organization
product_description: The world famous Crescent brand presents out new line of combination wrench sets. These tools have incredible strength and superior resistance to abrasion and corrosion, due to their Crestoloy® alloy steel heat-treated construction. These wrenches meet new ANSI and ASME specifications and come with a full satisfaction guarantee. Crescent - providing quality tools trusted by the trade since 1907.

name: HAUTMEC 3PCS Adjustable Wrench Set Extra Wide Jaw Black Finish Adjustable Wrenches Drop-Forged CR-V Steel Metric & SAE Scales 6 in. 8 in. 10 in. for Home Garage Workshop DIY
short_description: Durability& Longevity: The materials of wrench determines their durability. Small adjustable wrench is made of premium Chrome Vanadium Steel with heat-treatment and drop-forged construction for durability and toughness. Corrosion-resistant black oxide finish prolongs its life.

Smooth Jaw Adjustment: Adjustable wrenches features a large knurl for easily smooth adjustment and single-handed operation, besides a hex jaw design to reduce slippage by gripping fasteners tightly. Optimal head width and non-protruding jaws allow accessibility for hard to reach spaces.

Metric & SAE Scales: The sides of the jaws have markings in both metric and SAE to streamline your adjustments before you place it on the bolt. It fits well and stays where it was set during use, no more guessing before you maneuver into an awkward position and having to re-size.
Ergonomic Grip: This adjustable wrench features an ergonomic handle for maximum comfort, won't ding into the palm. Handle hole for tethering, hanging or storage.

Versatility: Wrench adjustable suitable for multiple sizes of nuts and bolts with nice quality of various equipment, car, engineer. Ideal for plumbers, electricians and maintainers. it should be a great addition to anyone's tool box.

name: Crescent 180 Piece Professional Tool Set in Tool Storage Case - CTK180
short_description: The Crescent Professional Tool Set has a newly designed 72T quick release ratchet
Carefully selected assortment of hand tools for most industrial, mechanical, and consumer applications
Get incredible access from combination wrenches with narrow heads, adjustable wrenches and pliers, and low profile head quick release ratchets all in this tool set
Get incredible access from combination wrenches with narrow heads, adjustable wrenches and pliers, and low profile head quick release ratchets
Co-molded bit driver and screwdriver handles with ergonomic grip for improved performance
Shallow and deep SAE/metric 6 point full polish chrome sockets with stamped size markings for easy socket identification
6" adjustable wrench with hex jaw design reduces slippage by gripping fasteners tightly
Manufactured from chrome alloy steel for better strength and longer tool life
Set includes a heavy-duty blow molded case to keep your tools organized and secure
product_description: This Crescent general purpose mechanic's tool set contains a carefully selected assortment of professional tools for industrial jobs. It includes full polish chrome sockets and combination wrenches made from chrome alloy steel with stamped size markings for easy identification. The sets ratchets feature a new Crescent 72 tooth quick release design for the optimum balance of strength, speed and access. Also, included in the CTK180-07 set is a Crescent branded original adjustable wrench, professional dipped handle long nose pliers & diagonal pliers, SAE & Metric hex keys with caddie holders, ergonomic molded handle Phillips & Slotted screwdrivers, and an ergonomic molded handle bit driver with bits covering the most common application sizes in Phillips, Pozidriv, Slotted, Hex, Square, Torx, & Tamper-Proof Torx . The set comes packed in a heavy duty durable blow-molded case with a designated spot for each tool, heavy duty latches on top and bottom of case, and large handle for easy transport. Crescent - trusted by the trades to provide quality tools since 1907.

Max Jaw Capacity - 1 in. (25mm), 1-1/4in. (32mm), 1-1/2 in. (38mm), adjustable spud wrench set
